document.full_text: sony corp has backed off on plans to boost its stake in its joint lcd production venture with sharp corp for now, the nikkei business daily reported, citing company sources.
document.title: sony to forgo raising stake in sharp's lcd unit: report
lines_and_colors: sony corp has backed off on plans to boost its stake in its joint lcd production venture with sharp corp for now, the nikkei business daily reported, citing company sources.
